parameters.name: Symmetric
parameters.description: Value indicating whether this should be a symmetric weld, and if not, whether the dashed line is above or below the horizontal line as defined in swWeldSymbolSymmetric_e

title: IWeldSymbol.SetSymmetric
description: Sets whether this weld symbol is a symmetric weld.

parameters.name: Symmetric
parameters.description: Value indicating whether this should be a symmetric weld, and if not, whether the dashed line is above or below the horizontal line as defined in swWeldSymbolSymmetric_e

remarks:
To get whether a weld symbol is a symmetric weld, use
IWeldSymbol::GetSymmetric
.
